attributes.action: impose an extra tax of 5% on  proffesional footballers wages, who recieve over £5,000 a week , and use this towards better education and a better NHS service with stronger pay packets.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: footballers, along with other big stars get paid way too much as we all know, and giving this small extra bit of their weekly wage would go a long long way in paying for the shortages in schools and hospitals, as well as giving peeople with real jobs a better standard of living.
